primaryPhoto.description:
The Almeida Theatre production of TAMMY FAYE is coming to London this winter.
This new musical by Elton John, with lyrics by Scissor Sisters’ Jake Shears, will be directed by Almeida Artistic Director Rupert Goold. Based on the book by award-winning writer James Graham (Ink, BBC’s Sherwood), TAMMY FAYE will showcase the acting talents of Olivier Award-winning actress Katie Brayben (Beautiful) in the titular role of Tammy Faye, and Tony Award-nominated actor Andrew Rannells (The Book of Mormon, Girls) as Jim Bakker.
See religion revolutionised in this true story about faith, resilience, and staying true to what’s in your heart. God bless Tammy Faye!
Sign up to hear more about TAMMY FAYE theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
